sources.title: Chicago Syndicate
sources.description: Title: Chicago Syndicate Summary: An ex-military accountant is recruited by the FBI to infiltrate the mob in Chicago in an attempt to break open the rackets. To complicate his job, two women stand in his way, each with their own agenda. Directed by: Fred F. Sears Actors: Production Company: Clover Productions Release Date: July 1955 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 An ex-military accountant is recruited by the FBI to infiltrate the mob in Chicago in an attempt to break open the rackets. To complicate his job, two women stand in his way, each with their own agenda.

sources.title: Chicago Syndicate (restored, colorized) (1955, film noir, imdb score: 6.5)
sources.description: Chicago Syndicate is a 1955 American film noir crime film directed by Fred F. Sears and starring Dennis O'Keefe and Abbe Lane .

metadata.Plot: A former military accountant is recruited by the FBI to infiltrate the mob in Chicago in an attempt to break open the rackets. To complicate his job, two women stand in his way, each with her own agenda.
metadata.Actors: Dennis O'Keefe, Abbe Lane, Paul Stewart
